4thLevelClericSpells.Name: Banishment
4thLevelClericSpells.Description: You attempt to send one creature that you can see within range to another plane of existence.

4thLevelClericSpells.Name: Control Water
4thLevelClericSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, you control any freestanding water inside an area you choose that is a cube up to 100 feet on a side.

4thLevelClericSpells.Name: Death Ward
4thLevelClericSpells.Description: You touch a creature and grant it a measure of protection from death.

4thLevelClericSpells.Name: Divination
4thLevelClericSpells.Description: Your magic and an offering put you in contact with a god or a god’s servants.

4thLevelClericSpells.Name: Freedom of Movement
4thLevelClericSpells.Description: For the duration, the target's movement is unaffected by difficult terrain, and spells and other magical effects can neither reduce the target’s speed nor cause the target to be paralyzed or restrained.

4thLevelClericSpells.Name: Guardian of Faith
4thLevelClericSpells.Description: A Large spectral guardian appears and hovers for the duration in an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within range.

4thLevelClericSpells.Name: Locate Creature
4thLevelClericSpells.Description: Describe or name a creature that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the creature’s location, as long as that creature is within 1,000 feet of you.

4thLevelClericSpells.Name: Stone Shape
4thLevelClericSpells.Description: You touch a stone object of Medium size or smaller or a section of stone no more than 5 feet in any dimension and form it into any shape that suits your purpose.
